text: "Hit Sale" is a French language hit by the French band Therapie Taxi featuring additional vocals by Belgian rapper Roméo Elvis. The song is also the lead track of the same titled album Hit Sale released by Therapie Taxi. The single has topped Ultratop's Wallonia Singles Chart in addition to charting in France. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" ! Chart (2017–2018) ! Peak position |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" ! Chart (2018) ! title: Hit Sale
